content: Just interviewing candidates, you know, living the dream. But if you’re free, we could discuss your coding skills! What’s your preferred debugging tool?
Glad you think so! If only my coffee were as strong as my enthusiasm. What's a project you’re particularly proud of?
No worries, take your time! What challenges did you face in that project?
Ah, the classic "code under pressure" scenario. I hope you had an umbrella—or at least good error handling! What’s your go-to programming language?
